desc: Hello there, My name is Maya and i live in Zambia and have been learning code this year, but have not gotten to a point where i can create the app i want to create and have running by march 22, 2018. Therefore, i have decided to implore some help in order to reach my goal and quite possibly learn some new things along the way. I am working on a fairly small budget, but i am open to negotiable offers.So i am basically trying to create an app that is similar to the app called 'Depop' which is a platform and hybrid between instagram and ebay, where people in the Uk (recently opened to other parts of Europe and US) can display their clothing that they either bought and never wore, or wore a few times or for some reason they no longer want them. The clothes displayed can be liked and favorited and customers or prospective buyers are able to contact the vendor through private message and or correspond with them through the comment section of the particular subject item. I want to start on a small scale where young adults can create accounts and upload pictures of their merchandise which can then be bought by fellow youth and so on  (It is quite pivotal to have a look at the Depop app and its layout in order to see my vision)I have been thinking about a name but have not come up with one catchy enough yet. I expect to launch this app only in Zambia (Southern central Africa) for the use of young zambians perhaps starting with one city and then possibly expanding outwards to other surrounding cities.
title: HELP CREATING A MOBILE APPLICATION :)

desc: I already have a mobile application. I need few addition and improvements in it.The application is a data entry application that sync data across devices.A. I want that application should create a group lets say 5 members.( 5 which i can change later)B. Group should have only one admin and only he can add and remove members.C. Member should be only from the contact who uses the application.D. Member can be added only with security verification like OTP.E. When Data is entered by one member it should sync to all the members.F. Admin should have the right to choose data to should sync between which members.(eg. member B to sync data to all device, member C should sync only to A and B, and all should sync to admin.) this can be done using filtering data shown on each device.G. If any member makes any changes in the data entry the change needs to sync to all members.H. Member can make changes only to data that he has entered.I. Admin can make changes in all data entryJ. If the user is offline the data should sync as soon as connected to network.UI is made and code is written for Contact Adding, removing and editing on local database.UI and code is written Data entry.Major code to be written on android is done. Only little change will be required.Work that needs to be done:1. Writing Android code for creating group and adding members.2. Writing Async classes to sync data between members server side in php and Android3. Writing android code to show filtered data as mentioned above in point F.Please note UI is ready with no changes required in data entry activity. Only One change that i need is in Contact list with regards to scrolling.Please read all the point mentioned above before posting a quote.
title: Modify android code and build backend php Async classes

desc: I need  an iPhone app.  I would like it designed and built.  I am looking to start a car advertising business. I want to create an app-think similar to set up to Tinder(swiping and profile if you like the initial photo).SO...the car owner creates a profile-photo of their car , photo of them self, and then 1-2 pages with brief details about themselves.(the business owners swipe through these pages) And then if they "like" someone they let them know this-the car owner is notified and gets to see which company wants to advertise on their vehicle, and what the advert/sign will look like..they(the vehicle owner) can then say "yes" or "no" to that company.If they respond yes(meaning both parties wish to work together. My team are notified via email of the two parties that have had a "match"..... and we take things from there. They are both notified of this on the app and via email.Also-is it possible for some kind of location/finder for the business owner to be able to see where exactly the car they have their sign on is located at any time? Ideally with some kind of km done by the vehicle update?(e.g. in Uber you can see where the nearest drivers are? Like that-but only for the driver that is "owned" by the business/advertiser.there is slightly more to it, but this is the bulk of it. Ideally I would Like to skype weekly with the developer.Thank you.

desc: Looking for an experienced developer to create a simple prototype based on existing code base.The deliverables are the following:- a git-based repo that will contain all the necessary code to closely replicate the Google Transport Tracker project – [url removed, login to view]- a working prototype for a tracker app that requires credential validation (same as tutorial) which transmits its location to a Firebase database- a working prototype for Google Maps-based web management page to visualize the locations of assets and display their unique IDs- detailed instructions on configuring and launching of app, back-end and web interface using Google Maps.- a video capture of the successful launch and execution of the app on an emulator and/or real device + viewing of assets on mapThere is no need for scheduling, viewing routes or snapping location to roads.Effectively, this project is a simplification of exiting code.Furthermore, this code should not meet the criteria required for the purchase of a premium Google Maps API license (versus production level example).I will provide you with repo credentials once the project starts.Finally, please read this description carefully before contacting me as I will not respond to anyone asking me preliminary questions which are answered above.Thank you.Daniel
